title: Brother PE Design 6.0 Embroidery Software without need for Dongl
description:
Unlike others found online there is no trojans or viruses, and no time lock asking you to send money to an email address.

Connect your PE-Design 6 to your PC; it opens the door to the new world of embroidery...

Creating fantastic designs becomes easier than ever. YouÃƒÂ¢??ll be amazed by the abundant power of expression achieved by the variety of stitches!

PE-Design 6 uses all these image files:

*.bmp, *.pcd, *.fpx, *.tif, *.jpg, *.pcx, *.wmf, *.eps, *.j2k, *.png

PE-Design 6 uses all these embroidey files:

*.pes, *.dst, *.exp, *.pcs, *.hus

Four exclusive applications to satisfy your creativity
Designing and editing patterns, programming stitch, and making database, PE-Design offers you unlimited possibilities!

Shading & blending
More new region stitches
Stamp function
Selectable running routes
Half stitch function
Enlarge/Reduce embroidery pattern keeping its density and stitch pattern
Lace enlargement
Creates an appliquÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â© automatically
35 styles of alphabet plus true type font conversion
Monograming
Easy operation for either beginners or experts
Right-click editing
Shows the entry/exit point of stitches
Print embroidery pattern in actual size
Improved point editing
PHC file can be imported
Confirming and editing the sewing order/colour
Reference Window
Stitch Simulator

System Requirements
-------------------

Computer: IBM-PC or compatible
Operating System: Windows 98, ME, XP or 2000
Processor: 500 MHz or more
Memory: Minimum 64Mb (256Mb or higher is recommended)
Hard Disk Space: Minimum 100Mb
Monitor: SVGA (800x600), 16-bit color or higher
